meanings: [동사] (식품·농산물 등을) process, (기계에 의해 대량으로) manufacture, (금속 등을 특정한 형태로) work

vlive.korean: [네모난 덩어리 또는 가루 형태 따위로 가공하기도 한다] 치킨스톡? [It is in the form of cubes or powder] Chicken stock? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.103
vlive.english: [It is in the form of cubes or powder] Chicken stock?

vlive.korean: 우유 가공식품 빵... Fermented milk bread... 듣기 View video World Klass (월드 클래스) : 🚨 게임으로 휘몰아친 6인실의 진실 🚨
공도 제대로 안 가. 공이 내 마음대로 안 가. I can't even kick the ball in the right direction. 듣기 View video BLACKPINK : 키크쟈^^
vlive.english: I can't even kick the ball in the right direction.

vlive.korean: 이게 가공된 닭고기 느낌? 약간 부드럽게 만든 닭고기 느낌? kind of like processed chicken to make it softer? 듣기 View video 컨버전스 TV (CONS TV) : Global Working Tour in Australia EP.09
vlive.english: kind of like processed chicken to make it softer?

vlive.korean: 쓸모가 없어요. - 가공이 안 돼요. 그런 의미로 모과라고 지은 거죠? It's no use. - It can't be processed. That is why you named yourself that? 듣기 View video V BOOKS : <송곳> 최규석 작가 북토크 생중계 (게스트 : 주호민, 이종범)
vlive.english: It's no use. - It can't be processed. That is why you named yourself that?

examples.korean: the mythical ‘rich uncle’ that he boasts about 발음듣기 그가 떠들고 다니는 가공의 ‘부자 삼촌’ Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the mythical ‘rich uncle’ that he boasts about 발음

examples.korean: a daunting/an impossible/a formidable/an unenviable, etc. task 발음듣기 무시무시한[엄청난]/불가능한/가공할 만한/피할 수 없는 과제[일] Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a daunting/an impossible/a formidable/an unenviable, etc. task 발음

examples.korean: The two players together make a formidable combination. 발음듣기 그 두 선수가 함께 하면 가공할 만한 팀이 된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The two players together make a formidable combination. 발음

examples.korean: appalling crimes committed against innocent children 발음듣기 순진한 아이들을 대상으로 저질러지는 가공할 범죄들 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: appalling crimes committed against innocent children 발음

examples.korean: The judge described the attack as an abominable crime. 발음듣기 판사는 그 공격 행위를 가공할 범죄라고 일컬었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The judge described the attack as an abominable crime. 발음
